name: Ant Game (Johan32123)
description:
Drag the ants by the body!

 Crush the ants with the yellow block thingy!

Clone and create an endless army of ants!!!

Game updated regularly!!!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Version 0.4: Fire ants are now here! they are smaller and bouncy.. yeah that's it (also sorta fixed some of the dragging idk its still super broken and I would like to keep it that way)

Version 0.3: small update that allows ants to collide with other ants

Version 0.2: create ant and create block buttons!!!! added a point where once an object falls far enough off of the map it deletes itself!

Version 0.1: added anti aliasing and bloom effects, changed the background color. The game looks much better now.

Version 0: game release!!!!!!!!11111111!!!1!1!
